website_summaries.verdict: The outer-eye fit feels more secure for some children and lends a wide field of vision.
pros: Solid goggles with UV-protected and anti-fog lenses
The frame is lightweight and soft, and the quick-fit buckle makes adjustments precise
cons: The outer-eye fit may not conform to smaller children or those with low nose bridges

customer_reviews.title: I love that they have good suction around the eyes that ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these Aqua Sphere Vista Junior goggles for my 5 year old son (he'll be 6 in August 2016) and he loves them. He's used them 5 times already in the swimming pool and said he can finally see when searching for those water rings in the pool. They do have a snug fit, but the straps can be adjusted. I love that they have good suction around the eyes that keeps the water out. These goggles are clear which helps my son's visibility in the pool. So far they seem very durable and haven't had any issues with them. They also come with a nice container to store them in when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Leal

customer_reviews.title: Buy these!
customer_reviews.text: Great find! My son is 4 and he constantly takes regular sized goggles off so we figured if they fit more like a mask...which he loves to wear...then may be he will keep these on more. Sure enough he loves them and the 3 best features are 1 they have a little button to push while you pull the strap to fit perfectly, super easy! 2 the whole goggle is flexible which makes them comfortable and less likely to break. 3 they have a good suction. Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Reenie

customer_reviews.title: Gives kids confidence
customer_reviews.text: I have the adult version for jetskiing and love it. Bought a junior version for a 5 year old that has been afraid to even get in the pool until he was 3, and still afraid to get water above his neck. I had him put this on during his bath, sit in the bathtub, and just ask him to lean forward and put his face in the water and look at his toes. He did, and within a few days he was doing cannonballs in the pool. Turns out he was afraid of water in his eyes, but once he was brave enough to test this in the tub, he had confidence to do anything. Swim lessons are next!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids afraid of water in their eyes!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has taken 4 years of swimming but hated getting water on her face which meant she wasn’t swimming! A woman at the pool a few weeks ago told me about these awesome goggles (her daughter was wearing them that day in the pool). She let my daughter borrow her spare pair for the day. Wow. My daughter swam and swam all day. I had to order these! Her pair arrived really quick from the seller. If you have a child afraid of water in the eyes but is ok with being in a pool to try to swim, get these!
customer_reviews.author: Tee O

customer_reviews.title: our kids love this brand
customer_reviews.text: My 8 yr old has been using this brand for a couple of years. The first one must have lasted 3 yrs or so...before she cracked the googles. She has always been very rough with them so I was not surprised (i believe she stepped on them maybe). They did seem pretty durable though. In that time she used them quiet a bit and she never complained about them. Now our > 3.5 yr old has started using a pair of her own and she was able to use them the other day without much fuss. I would say that's definitely a good sign on these googles. We recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: hiowatha

customer_reviews.title: My son's favorite
customer_reviews.text: These are my son's favorite goggles since he would never wear the traditional style. That said, it was years before he was able to wear these without leakage since kids often have a very low nose bridge and we had to wait for his to grow in a bit before these could work for him. They "fit" him before they worked for him. But now that his nose is growing in he LOVES them, and they've really lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Thrifty Shopper

customer_reviews.title: The perfect goggle for my kid
customer_reviews.text: We love these. My 10 year old got tired of the fussiness of her smaller goggles and started using these. When we lost them I had a new pair ordered as soon as we confirmed they were not in the pool lost and found. They are more comfortable, offer better view, and have tinted option for outdoor swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Reading Maven "Dani"

customer_reviews.title: Great swim mask, but short lived
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this swim mask after using a similar one from Aqua Sphere last year. Like last year, my daughter absolutely loved this swim mask. She used them 2 - 3 times a week for summer camp. But unlike last year's mask, these simply could not take the regular usage. (See the picture below. Only two months usage). With that being said, we will likely purchase a similar mask from a different company next year.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: My kids have loves these for years!
customer_reviews.text: The best goggles around! My kids are on their 4th or 5th pair, no joke! Not because they don't last but because we lose them. Easy adjustable sides. Super comfortable, my daughter has sensory processing disorder and they are comfortable enough for her which says a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Get these for your beginner swimmer!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old has been through several styles and brands of goggles, and these are the absolute favorite. They don't slip around and let water in when he goes underwater, and they are comfortable. The tiny button on the side that helps adjustment is worth the cost of these alone - no more fighting with the buckle and notches poolside. The buttons make for quick and easy adjustments.
customer_reviews.author: Amazone Customare

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 4 year old who is just learning to swim and I was concerned of the size of the googles he must be using, specially becuase I didn't want his fun to be ruined buy clorine water entering into his eyes. I must say all my concernes were washed out with this precious googles. They are big enough to cover part of his forhead and very confortable since they can be ajusted to the comfort of my son. 100% recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Loudog

customer_reviews.title: Great youth goggles
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my son and they have been great. They are easy to adjust and put on. The only time he got water inside of them was when he jumped in face first and even then it was a tiny amount. Zero fogging. Highly recommend these goggles.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Misty Eyed
customer_reviews.text: One start for a product that looks nice and is what it claims to be. The item arrived on time and undamaged. A feature I like is that the strap is easy to adjust, unlike most goggles. The four missing starts are because this product does not work. My 9 year old daughter who has had many pairs of goggles can not go underwater without them filling up with water. I have tried tightening the up the point of them hurting, but they just do not make a good seal. There is no sign of defect or damage, they just do not seal well.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in between goggles for kids
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these goggles. They're not so small that they fit inside the eye cup area and are uncomfortable, but they're not so big as to look like swim masks and be a bit ridiculous. They're juuust right. Worth the money. But buy a couple as if your kid is anything like mine, they'll lose a pair the first day.
customer_reviews.author: B.S.

customer_reviews.title: These goggles are great for my 8 year old daughter
customer_reviews.text: These goggles are great for my 8 year old daughter. She previously only wore the full "scuba" like mask, but needed something more streamlined for her recreational swim team. This was a good compromise for her. She likes the suction and the tinted lenses. These are her second pair, just to have an extra around the house. She loves the dual strap in the back because she can put her bun or ponytail in the middle.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Lemoine

customer_reviews.title: Best swim goggles ever
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this brand for years. Once I discovered it, its the only brand I use. The fit is excellent, the quality is great. The only trouble is that we lose them... so we have to keep buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Rabbino

customer_reviews.title: For bigger noses
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this mask. It is meant for a child with a big bridge/nose. The nose part does not fit well with smaller noses, so the mask leaks unless you really tighten the mask, in which case it pushes on the cheeks too much and hurts the child. I do like how it is easy to tighten and loosen. Wish it fit better on my child.
customer_reviews.author: bargain shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: These goggles are great for my 4 year old. He loves going under and looking around at the bottoms of pools and lakes. These don’t squeeze his eyeballs like traditional looking goggles. The suction is great and haven’t leaked yet. He’s gained a lot of confidence in the pool since getting these.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Morris

customer_reviews.title: Great mask for kids!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 8yr old daughter. Tried cheap googles on last year's vacation and she didn't like them at all and wound up not even using them, so was VERY hesitant to buy pricier googles. So glad we did though as she kept asking for them on this year's trip. Very good fit for her face with no leaking. Nice wide view also, as I even tried them on. Straps and buckle/button adjustment work fantastically... very important for girls (or boys) with longish hair. Likely will buy a "girlier" pair next year for daughter and pass these down to 6yr old son.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: For my now advanced swimmer these are great. Used them when she was 5 and still love this brand now that she's 8. Straps are adjustable and the goggles stay put. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these and they work really really well! Way better than the average. I bought these as they were on a list of the very best with a reasonable price. I am not disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for myself
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for myself as my eyes are narrow so it's difficult to find an adult size that fits me. Just ordered my 2nd one after 2 years as the first got a leak, but not sure how or where. Still like these goggles.
customer_reviews.author: lisaact

customer_reviews.title: Favorite goggles
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old dives into the pool with these on and doesn't get flooded with water. We spend a lot of time in an outdoor pool, and the UV protection protects her eyes from the Texas sun. They adjust well to make a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome goggles. Takes seconds to adjust.
customer_reviews.text: These goggles are Great! I struggled through three different goggles trying to get them to fit properly on my autistic son. These goggles took 30 seconds , offer a wide range of view, and look great. I bought 3 extra pairs so he will have one for years to come. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Easy to adjust and Great visibility!
customer_reviews.text: My son is 6 years old and he's loves these! We buy a pair every year, not because they don't last, but because he takes them everywhere and always looses them! they are easy to use and adjust with great visibility! Plus these look really cool on! Will buy this brand as long as he carries on wearing them!
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic. They are high quality, don't fall off, spread the suction across their entire face instead of just the eyes, and are tinted so the sun doesn't bother my boys. They are 4 and 6 and love them. They can do cannonballs, and they don't pop off. Easily adjustable, more than any other I've tried. Recommended by their swim instructor and we love them.
customer_reviews.author: DavidHuff

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for a couple months of summer for my son, but evening after rinsing them off after each use the lenses are fogged already and does not come off.
customer_reviews.author: CJEdwards

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice googles, my kids love it as they allow to see fished on the ocean. Easy to use and very durable. Highly recommended for kids
customer_reviews.author: Arnau

customer_reviews.title: Second pair... not quite as good.
customer_reviews.text: We love these goggles but the strap slips on these. It’s nit a problem we experienced with our first pair. Very annoying! But the comfort can’t be beat for my kiddo.
customer_reviews.author: Helloitsme

customer_reviews.title: These work great! Definitely leakproof and easily adjusted
customer_reviews.text: These work great! Definitely leakproof and easily adjusted. The only problem we have is that when my children are removing the goggles their hair easily tangles in release devices and get pulled out. I taught them to slick their hair back before attempting to remove them with good results.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Goggles.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product. My 3 year old loves these and refuses to take them off when doing waterborne activities. No more chlorine tears for my baby girl ;)
customer_reviews.author: Fernet

customer_reviews.title: I love the easy adjust on/off but they do grip hair ...
customer_reviews.text: I have two different pairs of these for my kids. We used them during swim lessons since my kids were afraid of getting their heads wet. I love the easy adjust on/off but they do grip hair and boy do my kids let me know that. They don't always keep all the water out but my 6 year old has learned how to lift and drain the water out. They do fit his face well and I've worn them in a pinch as well.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles
customer_reviews.text: These are great & easy to use. My daughter can easily put these on & adjust the sides. She hasn’t had issues with leaking
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Sliva

customer_reviews.title: Product received was not product purchased
customer_reviews.text: Item was not as described. Supposed to be pink goggles with blue lens and received blue goggles with orange. 3 stars because item received was not the same as what I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: he said they are super comfortable, and the band surrounding the lens is ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 6 year old son, a year ago and he loves them, he said they are super comfortable, and the band surrounding the lens is super soft and does not pinch. The size adjusts quite easily with the buttons on the side, so no need to worry about that. The water is completely sealed out so no issues with that either. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Best eye  goggles
customer_reviews.text: These are the best eye goggles for my kids' swim lessons. They didn't leak and have gone through a few years of lessons.
customer_reviews.author: P. Dang

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The only goggles my kids will wear. They lasted a little longer than 2 summers with VERY heavy usage in all water types (chlorine, lake, beach, etc). While most goggles typically barely last one summer these are worth the slightly higher price point for quality and longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Holli

customer_reviews.title: Best goggles ever!
customer_reviews.text: These goggles are great! Super easy to adjust since there is a button on the side to push then slide straps rather than trying to slide the straps just through the plastic piece. The goggles stay in place with perfect suction. This purchase was made after checking out a friend's pair nd seeing how well they worked.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great swim masks
customer_reviews.text: Great swim masks! This is the second pair we have purchased and they do a great job of sealing up to keep the water out, while not creating any discomfort for my children. Over time the will get scratched up and the lenses will become a little clouded, but I believe that to be normal for any set in this price range with continuous use by smaller children.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great for a 4 Year Old
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic for little faces! Fits my 4 year old perfectly around his nose due to the bridge being part of the goggles.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Best summer purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We decided to invest in a nicer pair of goggles for the summer instead of the cheap pairs we have had in the past. My daughter swam all weekend in these and never had an issue with the fit or water in her eyes. Looking forward to many more pool trips with them. We love how the straps are so easy to adjust. Makes it easy for a 6 year old to take them on and off herself.
customer_reviews.author: Pigskins & Pigtails

customer_reviews.title: Great swim mask!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mask for my 7 year old girl , I love the adjustable sides , there is no guessing games tightening or loosening the fit. It's very comfortable on the face while staying put, even with all the jumping and diving a busy body can do! It's very well made and we used all year long with no problem... We just ended up giving it to my niece , because she kept borrowing it, she loved so much.
customer_reviews.author: m julie

customer_reviews.title: Great swim googles
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these goggles. They are easy to put on, easy to adjust and are comfortable to wear. We have been purchasing these for swimming since they were 5 years old and wouldn't choose any other kind!
customer_reviews.author: Mom's Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Great googles for kids
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old son was sad we couldn’t find the goggles he likes anywhere and decided to try these. He’s very happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Crack
customer_reviews.text: Once I got the product my kids used it it cracked and she wasn’t able to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Too big for almost-5 year old
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for googles that fit my almost-5 year old but these were too big and don't seal around the nose (which means they don't keep water out). We'll hold onto them and perhaps as her face grows they will fit better in time. For now we're sticking with our Frogglez which are the only goggles I've found that seal well on a younger child's face (3 years and up).
customer_reviews.author: ArlingtonMom100

customer_reviews.title: The only goggles my children will wear
customer_reviews.text: My children fought other goggles but they needed them for swim lessons. THESE are the only ones they will wear. The eye pieces are comfortable and take up more surface area then most. I highly recommend them. They are worth the extra amount of money because the quality is there.
customer_reviews.author: KBB

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old loves these! They fit her well and keep water out of her eyes. She loves the colors.
customer_reviews.author: Ona

customer_reviews.title: Very Kid Friendly
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 7 year old son. The way the seal is formed around the eyes they’re very gentle and do not leak. I helped him with the initial sizing but my son has no problems using and adjusting himself. Wish I’d have found these sooner.
customer_reviews.author: ChickenVoodoo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My kid loved these. He grew out of them quickly, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Churning Soul

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old loves these perfect for swimming lessons. He has sensory issues so trying to find anything that doesn't bother him is hard, and these work perfectly. The adjuster button to make them tight or loose is very user friendly and was a major selling factor for me along with the great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary O

customer_reviews.title: Best goggles!
customer_reviews.text: Our favorites!! These are the only goggles we've found that do not leak. My children love them and use them almost every day during the summer. We have to get a new pair each year because they wear them out! Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: LoveStories

customer_reviews.title: What a find!!!
customer_reviews.text: The best goggles we've found for our 3.5 year old son. He loves wearing them. No reason to take on and off throughout swim class. The first is perfect. They cover so much of the area around the eye which seems to ensure that they stay put. Great quality and product.
customer_reviews.author: Hakkattack

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wouldn't wear traditional goggles but loves these with wider frame around the eyes!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Kenyon

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly but still gets foggy
customer_reviews.text: One of the big problems I have had with the Swim glasses for my son is that they get foggy after sometime in the water and I thought this one will not but unfortunately this one also got foggy after 30 min in water ... though the fit is perfect but it has not solved my main issue.
customer_reviews.author: Abhi

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son when he was about 3. He's about to turn 6 and they still fit. These swimming goggles are still in great shape after all these years. They haven't broken or cracked or anything. Great product! I would buy these again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: But my daughter said these were more most comfortable goggles she has had
customer_reviews.text: Fits a 5 year old perfectly. It does leave a mark on the forehead. But my daughter said these were more most comfortable goggles she has had. We have tried speedo from costco and speedo from walmart before.
customer_reviews.author: V. balasubramanian

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, comfortable, no leaking.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is picky about goggles but she loves these. This is her second pair. She used the first pair for a year before they got lost. They fit great, don't leak and seem to hold up well, so even though they are on the pricey side for goggles, I deem them worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke B

customer_reviews.title: My kids love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I wish I had these when I was a kid. They go around the eye enough to not bother your actual eye. I have a daughter with Down Syndrome and she doesn't like wearing regular goggles because they don't fit her eyes. These go around the outside of her eyes and the spacing between the eyes is enough to fit her well.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: loved it!!!
customer_reviews.text: these goggles are perfect for my six year old. way more comfortable than that other brands and more visibility.
customer_reviews.author: eml

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these and never has to worry about water getting in. They are very comfortable. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!
customer_reviews.author: Mother of 4

customer_reviews.title: Best goggles!
customer_reviews.text: I buy this every year for my kids cause they lost them. They last a long time (if not lost). These seems to stay on well while swimming. Blue glasses are best, helps with reflection and sensitivity eyes
customer_reviews.author: Doan Schulz

customer_reviews.title: Worth trying
customer_reviews.text: After going through multiple cheap goggles, I decided to give these a try. My kids loved the one piece mask-type, and I love the protective case they came with and the easy adjustment. So far, so good after daily use this week in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Insightful

customer_reviews.title: ... daughter uses these and they stay on her face better than the regular cheap swim goggles
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old daughter uses these and they stay on her face better than the regular cheap swim goggles.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Hoekstra

customer_reviews.title: These rock!
customer_reviews.text: These rock! They are the most comfortable goggles and they fit my 9 year old perfectly. He gets lots of compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Well made, sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Really well made goggles. Don't waste your money on those cheap ones. You're just throwing your money away even though they're cheap. I've had to throw out all the ones that came in a package of 2 or 3 because they got scratched up easily or just broke. These are super nice and well made and sturdy. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of two

customer_reviews.title: bit harsh on the nose bridge
customer_reviews.text: These seem to seal really well without much effort but they are a bit harsh on the bridge of the nose.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Williams

customer_reviews.title: falling apart
customer_reviews.text: my girls have had several pairs of these goggles over the years and have loved them. This pair, however, is tearing/falling apart after only 6 weeks of use. Unfortunately, it's past the return date. Will check with manufacturer for warranty info.
customer_reviews.author: Mary T.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and multi-use ready.
customer_reviews.text: Everyone in the family got a pair of these before we went on Caribbean vacation. These were very comfortable for swimming and snorkeling. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: S. Prince

customer_reviews.title: A good investment.
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old son loves these. They are so adjustable that I am sure he could have worn them at 2 years and will go on wearing them for a couple of years yet. They come in a very nice hard plastic clear case where they can be stored and protected.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Fear of water in your face?  Get this mask, no matter the price.  Best.Money.Spent.
customer_reviews.text: Our 6 1/2 year old had always been afraid to get his face in the water. This was his biggest fear in learning to swim. His amazing swim instructor at our local YMCA, "Mr. Ken", let him borrow a used, yet slightly cracked Aqua Sphere Vista Junior Swim mask on his first swim lesson to help overcome this fear. The crack didn't leak water into his eyes, surprisingly. He learned to swim quickly once he discovered the mask. It was such a helpful too that I invested in a brand new one from Amazon. At about $25, this swim mask may seem pricey, but it will not leak water. Even when cracked. Just be sure side straps are tightened enough.
customer_reviews.author: IMHO

customer_reviews.title: One down under
customer_reviews.text: It took a bit for my 4.5 year old to want to wear these, but once he got over the fact that it pinched his hair putting it on and he could see UNDER water - he was all for it! Finally his swim lessons started paying off, as he finally put his head in the water!
customer_reviews.author: Marguerite Connell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect. My 4 year old is always in the water. He is in swimming lessons twice a week and we have a pool. These goggles are durable and fit perfectly. They also don't fog up like cheapy brands.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit for my 5 year old boys and my 7 year old daughter. They all have very differently-sized heads and they work perfectly. Comfortable fit for hours of pool fun!
customer_reviews.author: Rowada

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Goggles!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 pairs of these for our twin granddaughters who are 7. Yesterday while swimming one commented, "These goggles are awesome Grammy" They love the tinting as they swim outdoors and were squinting prior to these goggles. There is no water leakage and they are so simple to adjust. I give these a big thumbs up!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: fits my face well
customer_reviews.text: I have to keep buying these goggles because the lenses wear out within 6 months to a year, but they fit my face well and good visibility. So I am a repeat customer.
customer_reviews.author: The Goose is OUT

customer_reviews.title: the seal is not that great. The plastic around the eyes are fairly hard ...
customer_reviews.text: Meh, the seal is not that great. The plastic around the eyes are fairly hard and the band needs to be tight to get a good seal. This makes it uncomfortable for the kids for a long period of time
customer_reviews.author: Raymond R. Robertson

customer_reviews.title: No leaking.
customer_reviews.text: These goggles are fantastic for kids. The traditional goggles can easily be filled with water but the way these are built, our girls have had nothing but success with them leading to a fun swimming experience.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Schkud

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really tight around my 9 year old sons eyes, he may need the adult size.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina M. Condo

customer_reviews.title: Great product - my 8 year old gives it two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: After buying some cheap swim goggles for my 8 year old daughter, I found they were flimsy, leaked and fit the old adage - "you get what you pay for." This Aqua Sphere swim mask has been exactly the opposite - easy to wear, easy to adjust, no issues with water getting in and just a real joy to use. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: SamPNY

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this based on all the good reviews. This mask leak around the face seal
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this based on all the good reviews. This mask leak around the face seal. I constantly tightening up the strap but water still getting into my mask.The mask is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Sandny G

customer_reviews.title: Good goggles that lasted one year
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Goggles! Work as expected. I love how easy it is to adjust the straps. This pair replaced the exact same pair I bought a year ago. The last pair was used 3-4 days per week. I only wish they would have lasted longer, but the goggles eventually cracked over the eye part and leaked water. My other child also has a pair that is about a year old that also have a small crack over the front and they will have to be replaced soon.
customer_reviews.author: Steve L.

customer_reviews.title: Did not keep out water on my 5 year old child’s face
customer_reviews.text: We bought these based on the strong reviews. Unfortunately the goggles failed. My 5 year old daughter tried to wear them but water gets in. We tried adjusting a few different ways but it just doesn’t help. Unfortunate as they are expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Jas

customer_reviews.title: These have been excellent for my 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: These have been excellent for my 3 year old. They never leak and are much more comfortable for her than standard swim goggles. I'm not sure if these would fit older children. The frame of the lense seems small. I would buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Towne

customer_reviews.title: Second Time Buyer
customer_reviews.text: Second time buying the exact same swim mask. Daughter loves them. She's picky. They are everything you want in swim goggles for your kids. Easy to put on, take off, she wears them, they look great, and her eyes are protected from UV and chlorine.
customer_reviews.author: jiminywu

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles!
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter is obsessed with these goggles. The soft silicon easily suctions to her face and creates a watertight seal, even when they aren't adjusted tight. Seem to be durable and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: jlawson

customer_reviews.title: Great fit.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Our swim teacher recommended them and so far they’re my son’s favorite goggles.
customer_reviews.author: XT

customer_reviews.title: More comfortable than regular swim goggles.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 5 year old's head with a swim cap and is easy for her to adjust. Very cute design. Cheaper and more secure than Speedo's Neoprene model that had stretched out, velcro would not hold, and eventually snapped. The polymer rim around the face is also softer, the Speedo got really hard after storage for one winter season.
customer_reviews.author: J.C. Pennywise

customer_reviews.title: Fits great!
customer_reviews.text: Our girls are 8 and 7 and love these goggles. They stay in place and do well to keep the water out. Very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: timothy g taggart

customer_reviews.title: Follow simple directions and you will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Finally found easy to use goggles for little kids that works well. Just follow directions and use the buttons to loosen before putting on and pull tight after fitting on face. Then use the buttons to loosen again when taking off. No stretching over hair and face and adjusting for leaks if you follow directions.
customer_reviews.author: kittycat qurrio

customer_reviews.title: The skirting is not as durable as the adult models ...
customer_reviews.text: The skirting is not as durable as the adult models so it deforms a bit from the added abuse kids do.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for Toddlers
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 3.5 year old. Traditional goggles didn't fit him well, would constantly fill with water, and seemed really uncomfortable. This goggle-mask hybrid is amazing. It never lets any water in and is much more soft and forgiving around the eyes and face. Now my toddler swims underwater longer, and just loves swim time!
customer_reviews.author: J Mann

customer_reviews.title: To big
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 4 year old and it’s too big and it just keep sliding down no matter how tight I put it ..
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: They leak but awesome quality otherwise.
customer_reviews.text: There is a slight leak at the bridge of the nose. These were not made for people with shallow nose bridges other than that they are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: hawkfire27

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 4 years old and she loves these goggles. The shape is great because they don’t dig into your eyes
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Best Googles
customer_reviews.text: These googles are the best ones to buy. They last all year. This is second year I bought these for both granddaughters. Only ones I would buy
customer_reviews.author: RWOLFE

customer_reviews.title: great product. Fits our 6 year old daughter's face ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, great product. Fits our 6 year old daughter's face well. This is our second pair of these goggles. They don't leak and they hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: mommykins

customer_reviews.title: The best goggles for kids
customer_reviews.text: I love these goggles because my children (and their friends, and their friends' friends...) can put them on and take them off BY THEMSELVES. They are super-easy to tighten, and loosen with the click of a button. I asked my four year old if he wanted help getting his on, and he said, "No, I've got this!" My only complaint, they tend to disappear if we take them to public pools. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Erin gray

customer_reviews.title: Not good for Asian faces ...
customer_reviews.text: Goggles look amazing but does not fit on the bridge area of my 4 year old daughter's nose. Water still gets in through the gaps. Being Asian my daughter has more of a button nose like most Asian kids. Sucks cause they seem pretty awesome too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it! My favorite googles for kids
customer_reviews.text: love it! My favorite googles for kids! Easy to adjust, cute and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Junqueira

product_meta.title: Aqua Sphere Vista Junior Swim Goggle, Made In Italy
product_meta.description: The newest Junior Swim mask combines the best Aqua Sphere technologies resulting in a comfortable, leak resistant fit with expanded visibility. The low profile frame is made with the soft yet durable Softeril material for a comfortable fit and the stylized frame offers fun and exciting colors that kids will love. The lightweight Plexisol lens offers 100% UVA and UVB protection, has a special anti-fog treatment, and is scratch resistant. Integrating the new Quick-fit buckle makes finding the perfect fit faster and easier than ever.
